WorkItem.ClosedComment: Described problems appear to be fixed in the current version when cooldown segmentation is enabled.
WorkItem.Description:
For some reason changing the fight duration either gives wierd results or brakes the program, namely:
 
1. I changed the duration to 180 (i.e. 3 minutes) and sequence in the stats tab shows that Molten fury is available from around 30 seconds into the fight and sequence reconstruction shows the CDs as being used from 30seconds to about 1m10s when MF fades and there are 1m50s of normal spell flinging.
 
2. Changing the fight length to 360 seconds causes rawr to freeze.

Comments.Message: Hmm, looking at the sequence at the default 5 minute duration I would have expected Mana gem to be used 3 times (due to 2t7) once at the start with all CDs once after 2minutes and one last time with heroism and MF, but Seq. reconstruction only shows 2 usages, with one about 15 seconds long at the start and the other which lasts as long as Heroism i.e. 40 seconds.
